# On-site Mobile Shredding Services Tender Announcement
## Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) seeks a trusted supplier to provide secure on-site or mobile paper and/or material document destruction services.

### Scope of Work
Paper documents, including correspondence, reports, books, plans, maps, drawings, diagrams, photographs, and other paper-based materials, are subject to secure destruction. The contracted services must encompass the destruction of sensitive information stored within RCMP facilities.

### Contract Duration
The contract duration is anticipated to span one year, with the option to extend it for two additional one-year periods. The expected start date for the contract is April 20, 2023.

### Security Considerations
The supplier must adhere to stringent security protocols, ensuring that all personnel involved in document destruction possess valid clearance and escort accompanies the supplier at all times while they are on RCMP premises.

### Tender Evaluation
Tenders will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest bid.

### Submission Guidelines
Interested suppliers must submit their tenders to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit via Adam Harrington at Adam.Harrington@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. Supporting documents are available for download from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).

### Official Languages
Tenders may be submitted in either of Canada's official languages.

### Important Notes
The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The notice will not be amended or sent for notification purposes, and it is the sole responsibility of the supplier to regularly consult the GETS for the most up-to-date information. Failure to do so will not be considered a valid justification for any claim or grievance. The Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada is applicable to this procurement, and bidders must ensure their compliance.
